question: Are deletions of chromosomal regulatory boundaries associated with congenital disease?
ideal_answer: Yes. Enhancer adoption caused by deletions of regulatory boundaries may contribute to a substantial minority of copy-number variation phenotypes and should thus be taken into account in their medical interpretation.

snippets.text: Deletions of chromosomal regulatory boundaries are associated with congenital disease.

Our results suggest that enhancer adoption caused by deletions of regulatory boundaries may contribute to a substantial minority of copy-number variation phenotypes and should thus be taken into account in their medical interpretation
